TopicTitle: Old "post your pics" thread has overflowed. New "post your pics" thread HERE.

Articles.Content:
Post any of your KSP pictures here. Rules are:

1. Only pics from Kerbal Space Program(obviously).

2. If you post many pics, then put them under spoilers.

Wow, I really just don't know how to post pics or spoilers. I don't know if the thread will actually work.

Oh well.

I don't see the point of this thread, there is already a pics thread up and alive

and second, spoilers do not work

and thirdly, unless you mail me your hardrive, I will not be able to see that screenshot. Just use imgur, it doesn't bite

You have to upload your picture to a site like imgur. Then, get the link of just the picture and nothing else (usually achieved by clicking on it) and then type:

If you use imgur, you can simply copy and paste the link on the right side of the screen that says, "message boards & forums."

It's somewhat ironic. The person who makes the picture thread can't give his own.

I dare you to go to the link in that picture.

Exactly, I don't know what to do about my pics. Secondly have you SEEN the other pics thread?! It has like 162 pages, meaning no one will ever see my pics when I post, even if I knew how to post them correctly.
There's already an official thread about screenshots, and it hasn't overflowed.

I don't see the point of this thread, there is already a pics thread up and alive

and second, spoilers do not work

and thirdly, unless you mail me your hardrive, I will not be able to see that screenshot. Just use imgur, it doesn't bite

How do I make spoilers work?
stop posting pictures here, this is not the picture thread!

How do I make spoilers work?

You can't. They just don't work at all.

How do I make spoilers work?

You don't. They were removed.
Skunky is usually the one responsible for putting up a new picture thread.

The old thread is still all good. We only used to create a new one on the old Forums as Simple Machines wasn't all too great with threads >100 pages; vBulletin is fine though.

Please stick to using the old thread instead, thanks!

This is FUN!

WAIT, WHAT HAPPENED TO MY EXTERNAL COMMAND SEAT TEXTURE!

stop posting pictures here, this is not the picture thread!

But the picture thread has 162 PAGES. IT's FRICKIN' OVERFLOWING! NO ONE WILL LOOK AT MY PICS 'CAUSE THEY'RE ALL THE WAY IN THE BACK!

But the picture thread has 162 PAGES. IT's FRICKIN' OVERFLOWING! NO ONE WILL LOOK AT MY PICS 'CAUSE THEY'RE ALL THE WAY IN THE BACK!

That's why smart people click on the "Last" button.

It's pretty selfish to start your own picture thread because you want your pictures to be on the first few pages.

You don't like the current one that the community has shared their picures on? That's not very nice.

I feel as if a lock is inbound. Over.

Also, why will you want to start a new one. Usually this only happens when a new feature (Space Stations etc) are implemented.

I feel as if a lock is inbound. Over.

I'm surprised it hasn't arrived yet.
